original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>打草驚蛇計謀成功，清除了城內所有的細作並加強巡邏<color=#bceea7>3個月</color>！(<color=#bceea7>打草驚蛇 成功</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent people to successfully attack <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>, clear all the details in the city and strengthen patrols for <color=#bceea7>3 months</color>>! (<color=#bceea7>「Lure out」 succeeded</color>)
